Lord Elde=
r shook his head, looking if nothing else ever more tired. He
sat down on a=
 large piece of debris as he gestured at the command
center. "And we fight =
with what? The only matrix is locked up in
Optimus Prime. Rodimus is gone, =
Primal is gone. The Maximals are
scattered out."

Elder sighed, "If we are =
to survive we need to come together, and we
need leadership."

Outside the =
earth continued to rock as the one identified as Legacy
continued to destro=
y sweep after sweep.
